segments.text: I observe the kitchen from this angle, taking in the details.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces the sink, towel bunched around the plate she's holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet water runs into the basin, which is full and overflowing slightly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the floor below, touching her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, cabinet doors hang open above the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside one, the cookie jar sits, lid off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy stands on a two-step stool, reaching inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts backward under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate in his other hand, perhaps to steady himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a girl stands with her arm raised toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks up expectantly at her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden path and bushes appear orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene captures a typical moment, but with hidden risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR
